name: Paul Kucharski
review: Nice church family. True to OBC. Reverent but relaxed. Go and visit. Warm and friendly atmosphere.

name: Martha Bacon
review: Very friendly gathering of people. Reformed preaching is sound and easy to listen to.  The pastor is a talented, friendly, godly man.

name: J Wood
review: Bible believing, Christ teaching church. Reaching out to the community.  Friendly atmosphere.  Women\mens Bible studies.
